document_title: Scheme for Agricultural Mechanization for Rural Areas (SAMA)
objective: To provide financial assistance to farmers for purchasing agricultural machinery and equipment.
benefits: Financial assistance for purchasing agricultural machinery and equipment
eligibility: Farmers who are citizens of India
Farmers who have a minimum landholding of 2 hectares
how_to_apply: Application forms can be downloaded from the official website
Forms can be submitted to the nearest agricultural office
important_dates_or_frequency: Every year, applications are accepted from January to March
